desc: I investigate and write stories that begin with data gathering, cleaning and analysis. I write a lot of SQL, build scrapers, sockets and frameworks in Python/Django and Node, and build visualizations and applications in D3, React and Vue.
I built tools and visualizations in D3js, HTML and CSS and wrote web scrapers in Python as part of a six-month fellowship with a non-profit news organization.
Built components and graphic dashboards in React/D3/Alt.js and maintained an API in Node/Express using Couchbase as a contractor for a project management platform in the construction industry.

Built tools and interfaces in AngularJS, data visualizations in D3.js and helped maintain the Python-based data pipeline (Luigi framework) as a contractor for Crewspark, a young, large-scale web app for data-driven organizations that allows users to ingest, share, analyze and visualize data.

Built JavaScript applications and data visualizations in a variety of frameworks as a consultant for Bitovi clients. Primarily worked with Apple Inc building and maintaining complex analytics dashboards.
Designed and built web pages for an online marketing company in JS, CSS, HTML and PHP.

Concieved, built and executed an online multimedia project focused on humanizing the crisis in Californiaâ€™s correctional system. Designed and built a responsive website with Wordpress, PHP, JavaScript and CSS. Raised money, support and publicity through social network campaigns. Wrote popular new media narratives published on The Huffington Post and NPR.com. Developed data visualizations on prison statistics. Built and distributed a weekly newsletter to over a thousand followers.

Sole editor for CorrectionsOne.com, an online magazine for criminal justice professionals published by the leading online media company in the public service market. Managed 30+ columnists and published 7-10 columns a week. Produced weekly eNewsletters for a 30,000+ subscriber base. Led video and editorial teams in development of multimedia special reports from events around the country. Worked with web development team in implementation of new site features. Oversaw development of social networking campaigns for all five online magazines at Praetorian Group.
